data.name: Letters From the Moon
data.detailed_description:
Dorothy Chen is the first Chinese-American woman on the moon, but she has a problem: her mission crash landed there. With rescue days away, Dorothy searches for a way to survive and finds a vast underground alien city. The aliens have died log ago, but she finds an educational simulation in the form of a holographic cat, Jiqi, to help her navigate the strange city with all of its dangers. She faces insane robots, mutant canines, starvation, and insanity inside the city of the Anthria. Whether she survives is up to YOU in this pick your own story adventure with over 30 different endings.

This game is an interactive book with additional features such as inventory and achievements.
data.about_the_game:
Dorothy Chen is the first Chinese-American woman on the moon, but she has a problem: her mission crash landed there. She faces insane robots, mutant canines, starvation, and insanity inside the city of the Anthria. Whether she survives is up to YOU in this pick your own story adventure with over 30 different endings.

This game is an interactive book with additional features such as inventory and achievements.
data.short_description: In this sci-fi pick your own story game, you must help astronaut Dorothy Chen survive in a vast underground alien city beneath the moon's surface. She faces insane robots, mutant canines, starvation, and insanity inside the city of the Anthria. Whether she survives is up to YOU.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Celeron or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
